channel.title: DST on MOK's Onomatomaniske Kaos
channel.description: Recent content in DST on MOK's Onomatomaniske Kaos

item.title: Timezone Aware Timestamps in Python
item.description: The datetime object in Python is very powerful, but if you want to do serious timeseries analysis and use data from around the world, you need to use timezone aware datetime objects, and these are not the default.
